## Función de Densidad

$$
f(x)= \left\{
	       \begin{array}{ll}
		 \displaystyle \frac{\Gamma(\alpha +\beta)(x-a)^{\alpha-1}(b-x)^{\beta -1}}{\Gamma(\alpha)\Gamma(\beta)(b-a)^{\alpha +\beta -1}}      & \mathrm{si\ } a \le x \le b \\
		 0     & \mathrm{si\ } x \ne (a,b) 
	       \end{array}
	     \right.
$$


## Función de Distribución

$$
 F(x) = P(X \le x)
$$

## Media

$$
E[X]= a + (b-a)\frac{\alpha}{\alpha + \beta}
$$

## Varianza

$$
Var[X]= \displaystyle \frac{(b-a)^2\alpha\beta}{(\alpha +\beta +1)(\alpha+\beta)^2}
$$
